colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES PA LHA CHEN HANG KA'I RGYAL PO GSER SKYEMS 'DOD DGU'I LONGS SPYOD ZHES BYA BA, ,DGRA JAG CHOG CHOM RKUN SPYANG SHOR GNOD BYED DANG, ,MI NOR BKRA SHIS LONGS SPYOD DANG SPOG LUS DBANG THANG RLUNG RTA DANG, ,THAN SANG SER DANG CHAR DRAG THOG SER GLOG MI SHOR CHU 'BRUL @006A *, ,RLUNG DMAR BRDIBS MI NAD PHYUGS NAD GOD KHA NANG GDON BAR CHAD SDUG BSNGAL ZHI, SAB RKO SHING BCAD JO GNYAN GLOG PA DANG, GNOD BYED THAMS CAD DGROL BAR 'GYUR RO, MI KHA BYAD KHA LCAG SGROG GTZONG RANG RNAMS DANG BCINGS PA LO ZLA ZHAG DUS SKEG NGAN SONG GSUM LAS SKYES MING 'GYUR RO, ,BUD DHA DHARMA BADZRA SHR'I DZ'A NA AARTHA SIDDHI GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE'O, ,)
